alert.note: Alert for Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Wakulla, southeastern Liberty and north central Franklin Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles north of Carrabelle, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Poplar Camp, Morgan Place, Smith Creek, Kern, Twin Pole, Sanborn and Owens Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
